DataElement.preferredName: Person Internet Access And E-mail Address Ind
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The yes/no response for questions related to a person's use of the internet and email delivery.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Person Internet Access And E-mail Address
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A human being._A worldwide, decentralized network of computer networks connecting individuals and organizations to information and electronic mail services._The right to obtain or make use of or take advantage of something (as services or membership); the right to enter.  Also, an act or means of approaching._An article which expresses the relation of connection or addition. It is used to conjoin a word with a word, a clause with a clause, or a sentence with a sentence._A text string identifier for a location to which e-mail can be delivered.

Property.preferredDefinition: A worldwide, decentralized network of computer networks connecting individuals and organizations to information and electronic mail services.:The right to obtain or make use of or take advantage of something (as services or membership); the right to enter.  Also, an act or means of approaching.:An article which expresses the relation of connection or addition. It is used to conjoin a word with a word, a clause with a clause, or a sentence with a sentence.:A text string identifier for a location to which e-mail can be delivered.

Concepts.definition: A worldwide, decentralized network of computer networks connecting individuals and organizations to information and electronic mail services.
The right to obtain or make use of or take advantage of something (as services or membership); the right to enter.  Also, an act or means of approaching.
An article which expresses the relation of connection or addition. It is used to conjoin a word with a word, a clause with a clause, or a sentence with a sentence.
A text string identifier for a location to which e-mail can be delivered.
